select new com.jshx.hmd.entity.Hmd(t.id, t.areaId, t.companyName, t.startTime,t.illegalActivity) from Hmd t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.startTime >= :startProDate
and t.startTime <= :endProDate
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and t.companyId = :companyId
order by t.createTime desc
